transcript:
Hello, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.

Hello?
Hello.
Hmm.
Hello, yeh Vandan distributors se baat kar rahe hai aap?
Hanji.
Hanji hanji, mein Shiv baat kar raha tha business manager IndiaMART office se, kaise hai aap?
Bas badhiya badhiya bataiye.
Bahut badhiya sir, kal bhi aapko phone laga raha tha but aapka number toh connect hi nahi hota yeh wala. Mein actually hospital mein tha, mein hospital mein tha actually.
Okay okay okay, mere isse pehle wale number pe baat hui thi Sanjay ji ke saath, unhone mujhe aapka number bataya ke is number pe hi baat kar raha hai karne ke liye na, toh maine kal lagaya teen chaar baar number lagaya tha, shaam ke time pe lagaya phir aapko phone nahi laga. Haan mere ko pata hai mere ko Sheban ka bhi message aaya tha lekin mein actually emergency mein na hospital mein tha toh maine nahi receive kiya tha.
Okay okay okay.
Is taraf bhi baat ho sakti hai aapse?
Han boliye boliye.
Ji ji ji ji, wohi sir aapka ek concern chal raha tha turnover change ka leke, right? Toh aapki Shiban ke saath aur unke jo manager hai shayad unse bhi baat hui hogi Kajal ke saath, right? Aur technical team se bhi unhone confirm kiya, abhi maine kal phir se technical team se ek bari dobara baat kari jo technical team ke manager hai, right? Head hai, unse bhi maine ek baar discuss kiya, right? Toh without sir annual aggregate turnover hum woh update nahi kar sakte actually, woh possible nahi hai.
Sir sir sir without without nahi hai, mein aapko de raha hu. Lekin woh aapko agar nahi chal raha hai, theek hai? Mein mein aapko woh pura jo jo aapko aggregate turnover chahiye na, dekho jab point is agar aapko pata hai unka toh GST ka jo bhi agar yeh proprietorship hai, theek hai? Toh mein aapko uska audit report de raha hu.
Sir mein samajh gaya aap aap jo de rahe hai aap apni jagah theek hai. ITR return de raha hu. Sir samajh gaya aapko baat sir lekin company ke toh guidelines protocol policies honge.
Mein samajh gaya sir aap please understand kariye sir. Sir protocol policies kis tarah suno suno.
Protocol policies sab jagah hoti hai aisa nahi hota hai, mein mana nahi kar raha hu, dekho portal ki glitch hai toh usme mein bhi kuch nahi kar sakta aap bhi kuch nahi kar sakte. Abhi dekho isme yahi hai ki aapko thoda sa thoda sa aapko hi karna padega kyunki mein toh kuch nahi kar paunga. Sir yeh cheeze thoda aur kam se nahi hoti, aap kya meri company ke hote sir jo bhi thode se nahi ho jo proof lagega sir woh proof lagega hi kyunki yeh mujhe nahi karna, yeh technical team karti hai, yeh mujhe nahi karna sir ke mujhe karna hota mein aapse leke kar deta. Woh technical team hi karti hai unke jo guidelines hai sir unko follow karne padenge.
Okay.
Aapko proof kya chahiye ke aapko aggregate turnover. Jab aapke paas jab aapka woh correct ho jayega. Yeh pichle teen mahine se nahi hua hai, teen mahine se nahi hua hai toh mein aur kya karu?
Sir har company ka, maine recently, maine recently waha se screenshot bhi mangwaya actually, unhone screenshot bhi mujhe de diya, maine Shiban ko bheja tha team ko, team ne shayad aapko bheja hoga. Mein kidhar mana kar raha hu, mein kidhar, mein aapko yeh ekdum simple baat bol raha hu ki aggregate annual nahi dikh raha hai par per month ka mein aapko photo aur PDF ke toh PDF bhej raha hu na. Actually sir aap 12 mahine ka. Sir aggregate hi bhi chahiye.
Sir aggregated turnover se hi kaam hoga, matlab maine dekh liya sir baat kar liya maine isiliye. Mein toh mein de raha hu. Maine isliye upar bhi baat kar liya technical team jo hai jo humari team update karti hai GST wali yeh sab jo update karti hai.
So arey kyun GST wale CA ko pucho ki GST portal pe aur audit ITR file jo file already kiya hai uploaded hai woh do ka woh dono match match jo hai woh dono same concept hai.
Samajhne ki koshish kariye, jo cheeze jaise hoti hai waise hi hongi. Yaha pe koi aise GST wale se puchna aur usse bol ke ke bhai yeh nahi ho pa raha hai yeh ho raha hai uske tarike se kaam nahi hota sir. Aur aisa nahi hai sir aapka baki logo ka problem aayega toh aggregate turnover aisa toh nahi sir aapse hi bas mein mang raha hu. Kal ko koi bhi customer aayega sir usse yahi required hoga toh hi change hota hai. Mere ko dene mein problem thodi hai lekin glitch aa raha hai, maine usko photo bhi bhej diya phir bhi glitch aa raha hai.
Samajh raha hu mein samajh raha hu. Aap ek baar apne CA se baat karke aur annual portal pe ek baar dekh lijiye sir woh kuch na kuch glitch aa raha hoga woh correct ho jayega. CA ke haan wohi toh bol raha hu glitch aa raha hai, glitch CA kaun karega woh portal karti hai. Government karti hai, woh CA ke haath mein thodi ho raha hai, CA ke haath mein hota toh mera kab ka yeh do mahine ka dimag hi nahi gaya hota mera.
Sir aur koi possibility nahi hai, I'm really sorry matlab usme maine baat kar liya hai sir otherwise koi issue thodi hai sir, itni badi koi cheez hi nahi hai. Sir. Sir aapke liye nahi hai humare business mein hoti hai agar aap 40 50. Nahi nahi aapko baat karni thi na sir senior se toh mein aapse baat kar raha hu lekin sir jo cheez possible nahi hai woh cheez yeh thodi sir senior se baat karke mein rules change kar dunga, aap yeh toh samjhiye. Rules change nahi, aap aap ready hi nahi ho yeh cheez samajhne ke liye ki woh dono vice versa same cheez hoti hai aur aapke aapke koi bhi employee mere ko yeh. Sir maine baat kar liya aage uske baad hi aapko call kiya hoga.
Aapko lagta hai mein toh yahi chahunga na customer ki problem solve ho, baat khatam. Aage bhi mujhe aapko service deni hai aapke saath hi rehna hai sir jude hue, aap samjhiye. Sir teen mahine se mein jo mein pareshan ho raha hu, aap mere ko koi ek alag batao. Aapko kya lagta hai aapko pareshan karne se humara koi fayda ho raha hoga sir? Mein toh yahi chahunga na aap pareshan na ho. Aapko na aapka fayda nahi fayda woh secondary but mein toh. Nahi sir aap required document nahi de pa rahe hai sir, ulta sir aap humari galti kyun bata rahe hai isme? Document suno suno, required document woh glitch arey woh aapka mera problem nahi woh glitch hai usme mein bhi nahi kar sakta kuch aap bhi nahi kar sakte. Sir toh woh glitch hai sir woh aapke portal pe hi aa raha hai na aap usse solve karwaiye woh toh aapke liye bhi question hona chahiye ki kyun aa raha hai, kal ko mujhe kahi aur dena pad gaya toh mujhe chahiye hoga. Government portal pe aa raha hai mere portal pe nahi aa raha hai, mera khud ka portal nahi hai woh. Sir us uske basis par hi hoga, aapne page 24 wala bhi diya tha. Uske basis par bolo. Hmm. Uske bolo GST ka aggregate turnover hi tere ko chahiye na woh mein de raha hu na. Sir uska turnover ka aapko abhi aapka naya aata hai ki aapko pura screenshot chahiye yeh chahiye woh chahiye. Nahi nahi yeh woh nahi chahiye sir ek hi cheez chahiye, yeh aur woh nahi chahiye sir, suniye suniye suniye, yeh aur woh nahi chahiye sir. Aggregate turnover aapka. Ek hi cheez chahiye uska screenshot aapko already bheja hoga Shiban ne bas wohi chahiye, aisa thodi bol rahe hai sir yeh bhi chahiye yeh bhi chahiye yeh bhi chahiye. Aapko jo bhi chahiye woh sahi se de raha hu lekin pehle woh bol raha hai aur bhejo phir dekh ke bolte hai sir nahi hai.
Sir jo maine aapko certificate bheja hua hai, ek screenshot bheja hoga Shiban ne usme mark ho rakha hoga shayad. Kisi aur customer ka ek aapko example ke taur pe bheja hai, wohi aggregate turnover chahiye sir. Aap mujhe bhijwa denge mein paanch minute mein change karwa dunga sir mujhe. Total government portal pe zero aayega toh mera toh aapke saath business karke koi problem agar koi bhi customer hai woh dekhega ki kya iska kar liya aapne iska history hai kya hai toh woh toh kya dikha raha hai, galat dikha raha hai. Sir subah shaam customer ka change hota rehta hai yeh, ek aap hi nahi karwa rahe hai lakho companya chal rahi hai aaye din hota rehta hai, sab certificate dete hai aaram se change karwate hai. Jab nahi ho pa raha hai sir tabhi toh mana karunga mujhe kya dikkat hogi change karwane mein sir aur is cheez mein sir itni mein samajh mein nahi aa raha sir aapko itni baat samajh jaani chahiye ke bhai yeh inki guidelines mein yeh hota hai lo bhai yeh le lo ab kar do change ab nahi ho raha sir toh aap ek baar samjho ek baar. Mein aapko ek aur aap aap nahi samajh rahe ho ek simple baat mere ko pata hai ki aapka aapki tarah se woh cheez nahi ho raha hai aur meri side se woh cheez nahi ho rahi hai kyunki dono ko pata hai ki dono ki galti nahi hai isme portal ki galti hai, mein bhi kuch nahi kar sakta. Sir humari toh koi galti nahi hai sir mein toh aisa hai nahi kuch mang ke phir kuch mangne lag gaya. Mein toh bol raha hu aap mere ko yeh batao ki kuch uski jagah pe kuch lo na aap bolo ki sir yeh document. Sir ek hi document lagta hai bas wohi. Hmm. Sir aap hoga sir. Sir maine baat kari uske baad hi aapko call kiya. Kal hi maine baat kar li thi aapko call karne se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change aggregate turnover.

- Customer says aggregate annual not visible.

- Customer says glitch in government portal.



Resolution:

- Executive said aggregate turnover needed for change.

- Executive said technical team needs required documents.

- Executive said customer needs to resolve glitch.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact CA to resolve glitch.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- aggregate turnover, gst, portal, glitch, documents
